front.title: The WebRTC Data Channel as a Transport for the Message Session Relay Protocol (MSRP)

abstract.t: The WebRTC Data Channel enables two-way real-time communication between browsers. This document updates normatively updates RFC 4975 to add support for WebRTC Data Channel as a transport for MSRP (Message Session Relay Protocol). This will enable secure, low- latency, structured peer-to-peer messaging between WebRTC end-points.
